meanings.sent1: The new dress she bought made her feel sexier than ever before.
meanings.sent2: The movie star looked sexier than anyone else on the red carpet.
meanings.sent3: The puppy thought the shiny ball was even sexier than its favorite chew toy.
meanings.sent4: The sunset over the ocean was like a painting, each color getting sexier as the night fell.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked cookies was so inviting, it made the kitchen feel sexier.

meanings.definition: More interesting or exciting in a sexual way.
meanings.sent1: The spicy salsa dance was sexier than the slow waltz they had learned.
meanings.sent2: The mysterious stranger at the party seemed sexier than anyone else there.
meanings.sent3: The cat found the laser pointer to be the sexier toy compared to the feather wand.
meanings.sent4: The city lights at night were like a sea of stars, each building trying to be sexier than the next.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the jazz band playing in the park made the evening even sexier.
